name: Fallarska
description:
Feed the beast. Created for Ludum Dare 37 in 72 hours.

HINT: Press the food machine button a second time when its light comes on to create food.

Made by:
Dylan Gallardo (@criticalmammal)
Farhan Qureshi (@jedlondo)

Update v1.1.0

  • Lots of nice atmospheric tweaks and polish
  • A clearer end sequence and improved animations
  • Performance increases
  • Some additional sound effects and music

Future Update Plans

  • Revise the food machine's interactions
  • Add missing sound effects
  • Improve overall pacing
  • Probably get a Linux and Mac version up soon
